step0:
Welcome to the Viafoura service template for Java + Spring Boot. 

Hit ENTER to input the project name that best describes your new service. Eg. User Service ->
step1:
The project slug represents the name of the github repo and the service Kubernetes. 
The dockerfile tags and jars that you generate will be named after the slug. Eg. livecomments-service, user-service. 

 Hit ENTER to input the slug ->
step2:
Project package name which represents the following structure : com.viafoura.<package_name>. 

Hit ENTER to input the package name ->
step3:
Specify ports for the service and mysql. Unique ports are helpful for local development when running multiple services. 

Hit ENTER to input ports ->
step4:
Specify the team you're working for:[civility] [conversion] [retention] [datamonetization]]. 

Hit ENTER to input team name ->
